thread.title: 'Cato Manor hit squad' case postponed
thread.title_full: 'Cato Manor hit squad' case postponed | News24

author: news24.com
title: 'Cato Manor hit squad' case postponed
text:
Durban - The protracted trial of the so-called “Cato Manor hit squad” has been postponed with two of the 28 accused ill and unable to attend court, the National Prosecuting Authority (NPA) said on Friday.
NPA spokesperson Natasha Ramkisson-Kara said the matter had been adjourned as the two were ill and the accused would be back in court on October 23.
This was the latest in a string of remands in a case that has stretched over nearly four years since 28 members of the Cato Manor serious and violent crimes unit were arrested.
The squad face a litany of charges including theft and murder, specifically of suspects during the course of their arrests.
